Key Match Events: Evan Mobley had 21 points, 11 rebounds and six assists
Scottie Barnes had 24 points, 10 rebounds and eight assists
Barnes cut into the paint and bullied the Cavaliers
Barnes guarded Garland on the biggest possession of the game and forced him into a difficult shot
Pre-Game Insights: Kenny Atkinson drew up an isolation for Evan Mobley to swing things
Rajaković thinks Scottie Barnes will be averaging double-doubles in the future
Atkinson believes Mobley has immense talent and is still unlocking him
Post-Match Reflections: Rajaković thinks Scottie Barnes will be averaging triple-doubles in the future
Mobley was excellent and made several winning plays down the stretch
Barnes has had to do a lot of everything and is counted on to guard on the perimeter and act as a back-line chaos agent
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers have the league's best record, best offensive rating, second-best net rating and eighth-best defensive rating
Mobley is taking 3.3 3-point attempts per 36 minutes, up from 1.4 in each of his first three years
Barnes has not dominated like that often, but he was great against the Cavaliers
Others: The Raptors are just 6-19 in the games in which Scottie Barnes has played
Barnes has been injured 13 games this season
Mobley has been so good that the Cavaliers have the luxury of incrementally diversifying his game
